information_for_contributors: This file has been converted from https://github.com/walles/git-commit-message-plus/blob/master/syntaxes/git-commit.tmLanguage.json
If you want to provide a fix or improvement, please create a pull request against the original repository.
Once accepted there, we are happy to receive an update request.
name: git-commit

patterns.comment: diff presented at the end of the commit message when using commit -v.
patterns.name: meta.embedded.diff.git-commit

patterns.comment: Mark > 50 lines as deprecated, > 72 as illegal

patterns.comment: Git supplied metadata in a number of lines starting with #
patterns.name: meta.scope.metadata.git-commit

patterns.comment: Fallback for non-English git commit template
